name: BEASTventlaed
description: Select 5 adjacent tokens: if 3 or more of these tokens are beast spirits of the same type, the 5 tokens are removed and you get bonuses based on the type of tokens. To score and survive, you need to balance your "intake" of beast, life, bomb and score tokens. Inspired by Yu-ki's Beventlaed, adapted to the beast spirit mechanics of Touhou 17.
